name: Schneidernavette
body:
### What is it?
SchneiderNavette is a navigation application very much like the famous GoogleMaps. It is aimed to aid the user to explore a geographical region virtually, plan routes and journeys, "Find" places of interest and much more.

### Why the name SchneiderNavette?
_Ville du Creusot_ was a hub of iron ore mines and forges which were bought by [Adolphe Schneider](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adolphe_Schneider) and his brother [Eug√®ne Schneider](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eug%C3%A8ne_Schneider) in 1836. They developed a business in steel, railways, armaments, and shipbuilding. The name is a tribute to the excellent work done by them.
"Navette" is the french word for shuttle. The project signifies the idea of exploring the city in a shuttle.

### Authors and Contributors
Igor Peric(codeteam17), Dina Youakim(dyouakim), Richard Macwan (rich4rdmacwan)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
